meanings.definition: An instance of sexual activity involving multiple participants.
meanings.sent1: The gangbang in the movie was just a scene, not real.
meanings.sent2: The police were called to break up a gangbang happening in the alley.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, the gangbang of superheroes was quite a sight.
meanings.sent4: The bustling market was a gangbang of colors and sounds.
meanings.sent5: The playground during recess was a joyful gangbang of children playing tag.

meanings.sent1: She decided to gangbang with her friends for her birthday.
meanings.sent2: He was arrested for attempting to gangbang in a public park.
meanings.sent3: The team decided to gangbang their efforts to finish the project on time.
meanings.sent4: The protesters planned to gangbang their voices to be heard by the government.
meanings.sent5: The students agreed to gangbang their ideas to create a memorable class presentation.
